title: Relaxing garden-style 816 sq ft 1 bed 1 bath - Wildwood At Stone Mountain
map_address: 6097 Memorial Dr near South Hairston Road
posting_body: ['Wildwood At Stone Mountain', 'No specials at this time.', 'Unit Details:', '1-BR 1-BA |', 'Square Footage:', '816 sq ft |', 'Rental Rates:', '$1180/Month!', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 12-Month', 'Apartment Features:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Cable Ready', '◾ Carpet', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Garbage Disposal', '◾ Handicap Accessible', '◾ Heating', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Patio or Balcony', '◾ Range', '◾ Alarm Systems in Select Apartments', '◾ All Appliances are Electric', '◾ Walk-in Closets in Select Apartments', '◾ Washers and Dryers Provided in Most Apartments', '◾ Water Based on Usage', '◾ White on White Kitchens', 'About Our Community:', 'Welcome to Wildwood at Stone Mountain Apartment Homes, a hidden treasure in the shadow of Stone Mountain.', 'Relax on your private patio or balcony.', 'Enjoy an array of amenities including a sparkling pool, fitness gym and Resident Business Center, all in the natural setting only 2 miles from Stone Mountain Park.', 'What a smart move!', 'Wonderful Amenities:', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Freeway Access', '◾ Gated', '◾ Onsite Maintenance', '◾ Onsite Management', '◾ Playground', '◾ Pool', '◾ Public Transportation', '◾ Shopping Nearby', '◾ 2 Miles from Stone Mountain Park', '◾ Controlled Access Entry Gates', '◾ Georgia Perimeter College Minutes Away', '◾ Marta Bus Stop at Community Entry', '◾ Professionally Landscaped', '◾ Sparkling Pool with Fountains', '◾ Walking Distance to Shopping and Dining', 'Contact Information:', 'Address:', '6097 Memorial Dr', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Pet Policy:', 'Breed Restriction;Weight Restriction;Pet friendly.', 'No pets over 10 pounds and no aggressive breeds.', ' $300 pet fee, $500 for two pets and $35 per pet each month.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'B131CFE1BD30410']
